class.name: Phaser.TweenManager

parameters.name: game
parameters.help: A reference to the currently running game.

class.help:
Phaser.Game has a single instance of the TweenManager through which all Tween objects are created and updated.
Tweens are hooked into the game clock and pause system, adjusting based on the game state.

TweenManager is based heavily on tween.js by http://soledadpenades.com.
The difference being that tweens belong to a games instance of TweenManager, rather than to a global TWEEN object.
It also has callbacks swapped for Signals and a few issues patched with regard to properties and completion errors.
Please see https://github.com/sole/tween.js for a full list of contributors.

public.name: add
public.help: Add a new tween into the TweenManager.

parameters.name: tween
parameters.help: The tween object you want to add.

public.name: create
public.help: Create a tween object for a specific object. The object can be any JavaScript object or Phaser object such as Sprite.

parameters.name: object
parameters.help: Object the tween will be run on.

public.name: getAll
public.help: Get all the tween objects in an array.

public.name: isTweening
public.help: Checks to see if a particular Sprite is currently being tweened.

parameters.name: object
parameters.help: The object to check for tweens against.

public.name: remove
public.help: Remove a tween from this manager.

parameters.name: tween
parameters.help: The tween object you want to remove.

public.name: removeAll
public.help: Remove all tweens running and in the queue. Doesn't call any of the tween onComplete events.

public.name: update
public.help: Update all the tween objects you added to this manager.

private.name: _pauseAll
private.help: Private. Called by game focus loss. Pauses all currently running tweens.

private.name: _resumeAll
private.help: Private. Called by game focus loss. Resumes all currently paused tweens.

private.name: _add
private.inlineHelp: All of the tweens queued to be added in the next update.

private.name: _tweens
private.inlineHelp: All of the currently running tweens.
